          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["In other words: for a symbolic link "],
              ["os.Lstat", [["c"]]],
              [" returns information about link and "],
              ["os.Stat", [["c"]]],
              [" about the file that it links to."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

              [" fails"]

              [". The difference is that "],
              ["os.Stat", [["c"]]],
              [" follows symbolic links and "],
              ["os.Lstat", [["c"]]],
              [" doesn’t."]
